description: Numbers n such that n divides the (left) concatenation of all numbers <= n written in base 24 (most significant digit on right).
comments: This sequence differs from A029541 in that all least significant zeros are kept during concatenation.The next term is > 410000. - Larry Reeves, Jan 16, 2002
author: Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), May 24 2001
extensions: Edited and updated by Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), Apr 12 2002
